section.para: nginx ("engine x") is an HTTP web server, reverse proxy, content cache, load balancer, TCP/UDP proxy server, and mail proxy server. Originally written by Igor Sysoev and distributed under the 2-clause BSD License. Enterprise distributions, commercial support and training are available from F5, Inc.

project.title: NGINX JavaScript
project.description: (njs) extends nginx functionality with an ECMAScript-compatible interpreter for HTTP and Stream modules.

project.title: NGINX Ingress Controller
project.description: connects Kubernetes apps and services with rock solid request handling, auth, self-service CRDs, and easy debugging.

project.title: NGINX Gateway Fabric
project.description: provides L4 and L7 routing capabilities in Kubernetes, implementing the Gateway API using NGINX as the data plane.
